title: d.c. systems
fullText:
The nominal d.c. voltage tolerance at the battery terminals over which all d.c. equipment shall operate is +25%, 12.5%.
The boat's essential services shall remain functional to the minimum voltage at the battery terminals.
NOTE: When battery chargers and battery combinations are used as d.c. power systems, adequate measures should be taken to keep the voltage within the specified limits during charging, quick charging and discharging of the battery.
